Apul new genome 

# genes 
https://gannet.fish.washington.edu/seashell/bu-github/deep-dive-expression/D-Apul/output/07-Apul-Hisat/genes.fasta

pulled via gff

```{bash}
cd ../data
curl -o Apul-genes.fasta https://gannet.fish.washington.edu/seashell/bu-github/deep-dive-expression/D-Apul/output/07-Apul-Hisat/genes.fasta

```


```{bash}
head ../data/Apul-genes.fasta
```



---

```{bash}
mkdir ../output/25-Apul-epimods-blast/

/home/shared/ncbi-blast-2.15.0+/bin/makeblastdb \
-in ../data/Apul-genes.fasta \
-dbtype nucl \
-out ../output/25-Apul-epimods-blast/Apul-genes
```




```{bash}
fasta="../data/Machinery.fasta"

/home/shared/ncbi-blast-2.15.0+/bin/tblastn \
-query $fasta \
-db ../output/25-Apul-epimods-blast/Apul-genes \
-out ../output/25-Apul-epimods-blast/Mach-tblastn-Apul_out.tab \
-evalue 1E-05 \
-num_threads 48 \
-max_target_seqs 1 \
-max_hsps 1 \
-outfmt 6 \
2>/dev/null
```

```{r, engine='bash', eval=TRUE}       
wc -l ../output/25-Apul-epimods-blast/Mach-tblastn-Apul_out.tab
```

```{r, engine='bash', eval=TRUE}        
head ../output/25-Apul-epimods-blast/Mach-tblastn-Apul_out.tab
```
